comments.author: rtublitz@mozilla.com
comments.text:
It looks like the [stub ping](https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/source/browser/installer/windows/docs/StubPing.rst) is not included in the list of common pings [here](https://firefox-source-docs.mozilla.org/toolkit/components/telemetry/data/index.html). Let's get it moved over there and then we can link to it from the docs within the actual stub code.

Also, we should adjust the [details around the data source](https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/source/browser/installer/windows/docs/StubPing.rst#11) to point to the newly moved data source. I'll add specifics to this bug once I find them, still tracking that info down.
comments.creator: rtublitz@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
It looks like the [stub ping](https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/source/browser/installer/windows/docs/StubPing.rst) is not included in the list of common pings [here](https://firefox-source-docs.mozilla.org/toolkit/components/telemetry/data/index.html). Let's get it moved over there and then we can link to it from the docs within the actual stub code.

Also, we should adjust the [details around the data source](https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/source/browser/installer/windows/docs/StubPing.rst#11) to point to the newly moved data source. I'll add specifics to this bug once I find them, still tracking that info down.

comments.author: rtublitz@mozilla.com
comments.text: Also, it looks like starting Jan 27, 2020 this includes historical data for the full installer as well. Use installer_type='stub' to filter down. This should probably be added to the docs somewhere and maybe we just rename this so it's even more clear that this ping covers both.
comments.raw_text: Also, it looks like starting Jan 27, 2020 this includes historical data for the full installer as well. Use installer_type='stub' to filter down. This should probably be added to the docs somewhere and maybe we just rename this so it's even more clear that this ping covers both.
comments.creator: rtublitz@mozilla.com

comments.text: We should also change the 'download_cancelled' text in the docs to 'user_cancelled' since that's the name of the key that's actually getting sent.
comments.author: rtublitz@mozilla.com
